choiceresponse.label: When do you need to update a jump_to_id link?

checkboxgroup.choice: When you offer a new run of your course.
When you move a unit within your course.
When you delete and recreate a unit.
When you edit a component within the unit.
When you delete all the components within a unit.

div.p: The jump_to_id link points directly at a particular unit. As long as that unit is still in your course, the link will still function properly, regardless of where the unit is or what changes have been made to it. Only deleting it and creating a new one will change that.
